report.title: My samples list
report.description: A general purpose list of samples with record counts.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM samples s JOIN surveys su on su.id=s.survey_id and su.deleted=false LEFT JOIN locations l ON l.id=s.location_id LEFT JOIN occurrences o on o.sample_id=s.id and o.deleted=false #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND s.created_by_id=#user_id#

param.name: default_input_form
param.description: Input form path to use when no other available

param.name: user_id
param.description: User whose samples are to be shown

column.name: input_form
column.sql: case when s.input_form is null then '#default_input_form#' else s.input_form end
